author: brianp
msg: Added a test case for nested if-statements in SSI files,

author: rbb
msg: If autoindex isn't loaded, the return code will be a 404.  If it is the
return code will be 403.  This makes the test respect that difference.

author: brianp
msg: Fixed a bug in the handling of nested if-statements in shtml files

author: rbb
msg: Allow 'make install DESTDIR=/path'.  This allows packagers to install
into a directory different from the one that was configured.  This
also mirrors the root= feature from 1.3.  We cannot use prefix=,
because both APR and APR-util resolve their installation paths at
configuration time.  This means that there is no variable prefix

author: rbowen
msg: Corrected typo, and added note about Directory sections applying to
files accessed via a different path, such as via symlinks.
